name: Nighty Night Kids - Winter
description:
It has become winter at the lily pond.
Everything rests under a white loving winter fur.
After an exciting winter day the little fly Emma is tired and wants to go to sleep.

But everybody at the frozen lily pond is still awake.
They still have to tidy away their toys in the toy box.
Can you help them, so they can go to sleep too? You only need to tidy away their toys into the box by drag & drop.

Four toys in each house only.
If you done it, the dream fairy brings sweet dreams to you and to the lovely inhabitants.

Your kids help prepare the lovely residents at the Lily Pond, like Emma the little fly, Mia the duck or Noah the loveable cockerel for their sleep.

As your kids watch the animals fall asleep in their houses, they’ll hopefully follow!

Our Nighty Night Kids - Winter is a truly gorgeous ebook, simple, subtle, and clever.

FEATURES:

• our interactive app has a calming narration!
• charming designs and animations by award winning Filmmaker Dipl. Biologist Volker Ide!
• delightful imagery!
• packed with a lot of animations, beautiful interactive objects and nature sounds!
• our spoken tale nurtures creativity and imagination!
• the perfect App for a daily go-to-sleep ritual
• for small children aged 2-4
• relaxing Winter Sounds
• Languages with narration: English (UK and US), German!

Please also check out our other great Apps for kids.

For more information, please visit our website:

www.myapps4kids.com
